meanings.sent1: The accessional key opened the gate easily.

meanings.sent3: The accessional ticket was so special, it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an accessional invitation to join the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The accessional bridge connected the two sides of the river seamlessly.

meanings.sent1: The accessional code granted permission to enter the building.

meanings.sent3: The accessional challenge was to find the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: His words were an accessional pathway to her heart.
